concept.title: Orchestrate : .Upgrading Conga Orchestrate from the AppExchange vOctober-23

conbody.p: Created by William Abernathy on Sep 21, 2023

Conga Orchestrate periodically pushes upgrades to all customers automatically, unless you have opted out. You may also upgrade to the latest version of Conga Orchestrate yourself from the Salesforce AppExchange.
To upgrade to a newer version of the product:

ol.li: Go to the Orchestrate AppExchange listing and click Get It Now.
Select Install in Production or Install in a Sandbox.
On the Confirm Installation Details screen, check I have read and agree to the terms and conditions and click Confirm and Install.
Select Yes, access to these third-party web sites to use this web service to manage access to Conga Orchestrate features.
Click Continue. You will receive an email notification when the installation is complete.
Select Done to return to Setup.
